Key Match Events: Pages had the first two-homer game of his career, leading off the second with his fourth homer of the season before going deep again with one out in the fifth

Their other run came in the sixth when Brendan Donovan singled, went to third on a double by Paul Goldschmidt and scored on a sacrifice fly by pinch-hitter Luken Baker, who has driven in a run in the last five games he has played
Adames' home run was his 13th three-run homer of the season, which ties the major-league record set by Ken Griffey Jr. in 1996
Post-Match Reflections: The Brewers have outscored the Cardinals 677-575 and have a run differential of plus 139 while the Cardinals run differential during their.500 season is minus 58

Goldschmidt extended his streak with at least one double to five consecutive games, the longest by a Cardinal since Matt Carpenter doubled in six games in a row in 2017. The team record is eight consecutive games with a double by Yadier Molina in 2016
Donovan had been 0-of-14 against Freddy Peralta before he singled in the fourth and sixth, the most at-bats he had against any pitcher without at least one hit
